item.description:
Get a start on celebrating Father's Day by joining us at the Colling's Foundation in Stow, MA. This is a private museum that is only open to the public 3 times a year! Take advantage of seeing antique autos from the glory days of automobiles...all in pristine condition. These are works of art. Picture yourself in a "rumble seat" or marvel at the ladies fashions that accompany the roadsters.

Also on display are Bob Colling's WWII aircraft. Plane rides are available by contacting the Colling's Foundation ahead of time.

The plan is to meet at 2:30, marvel at the museum, and (optionally) regather at 5:00 and travel a short distance to Stow's other airport (Minuteman Airfield) and dine at Nancy's Airfield Cafe at 5:30. RSVPS are required by June 15th if you plan to dine.
item.name: Celebrate Father's Day (a day early) at a unique Private Museum
